options.name: Potion of Rat Form
options.description: During any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer can choose to lose Attached (if they have it) and make a 6" Magical Move. They must end this move by joining another friendly unit (following the normal rules for joining units).

options.name: Favanite Powder
options.description: When casting a Hex spell, after seeing the result of the roll, the bearer can choose to gain Maniacal Enthusiasm(Casting Roll).

options.name: Plague-Hermit's Blessing
options.description: The number of HP is set to 6. Model gains the Cult of Errahman property. The model automatically fails all its Armour Saves rolls.

options.name: Sacred Aquila
options.description: The bearer and Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit gain Fury; in addition, for each natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ with a Melee Attack made by the bearer or a Rank-and-File model in its unit, the bearer's unit suffers 1 hit with Str 3 and AP 0 at the same Agility Step.

options.name: Bell of the Deep Roads
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Ambush(Terrain Feature with a friendly Tunnel Marker).

options.name: Rodentium Bullets
options.description: The weapon's Range is set to 18". The weapon gains +2 Shots, +1 AP, and Accurate.

options.name: Storm Rocket
options.description: Aim 3+. Range is set to 24", Str is set to 5 and AP is set to 2. The weapon gains Flaming Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-hit roll). If the weapon hits, it causes D6 hits instead of 1.

options.name: Secrets of the Doom Blade
options.description: +1 Att, +2 AP. Maniacal Enthusiasm(To-wound roll),Multiple Wounds(D3). Rolls this model makes on the Maniacal Enthusiasm chart gain a +2 modifier.

options.name: Swarm Master
options.description: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Grind Attack(X, Str 3, AP 1, Unmodifiable), where X is the number of Proper Ranks in the wielder's unit, up to a maximum of 10.

options.name: Tarina's Lyre
options.description: Stomp Attack made by enemy units within 8" of the bearer suffer a -2 to-wound modifier.

options.name: Crown of Hubris
options.description: At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may choose to inflict 3 HP losses on its unit. If this is used, the model gains Channel(2) with Duration: One Turn.

options.name: Scepter of the Usurper
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Fearless. If the General is removed as a casualty, the bearer becomes the General.

options.name: Darkstone Detonator
options.description:
At the end of any friendly Movement Phase after the first, the bearer may remove all friendly Tunnel Markers placed on a single Terrain Feature within 24" of the bearer.
	If so, 
	one unengaged unit in contact with that Terrain Feature suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4 and AP 1.
